snippet: UBS' head of investment banking for the Americas, Aryeh Bourkoff, has resigned to "pursue other opportunities," the firm announced in an internal memorandum on Tuesday.
abstract: UBS' head of investment banking for the Americas, Aryeh Bourkoff, has resigned to "pursue other opportunities," the firm announced in an internal memorandum on Tuesday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: UBS's Bourkoff Resigns as Americas Head of Investment Banking
